Articles.Content: I'm having trouble with Steam saying I'm not connected. Anyone else having this problem? Obviously, I'm connected to the internet.
I think steam is down, i can't connect either.

Steam can be flaky at times. Had to try twice to connect after it updated. It is up and running.

Unlike a lot of the games in the Steam Apps Common Folder, you can always play KSP without launching Steam by clicking directly on the KSP.exe icon.

Edited June 5, 2014 by SRV Ron

did you check issteamdown.com ?

In my experience, 95% of the time when I'm connected to the internet and steam says it's not connected, it's a problem on steam's end...

did you check issteamdown.com ?

In my experience, 95% of the time when I'm connected to the internet and steam says it's not connected, it's a problem on steam's end...

Sadly this, Steam can be iffy, it's slow occasionally too.

20 seconds to load a forum post I loaded 2 minutes ago.

Good job steam, good job.
